name: ITP - Mangahuini Sheet Pile Wall - F3002G - Earthworks - Bulk Fill
template name: ITP - Mangahuini Sheet Pile Wall - F3002G - Earthworks - Bulk Fill

name: Detail - Set out extents of fill and check against design drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Ground Improvements / Dig Outs for soft areas
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Must be completed as per Engineer requirements and be signed off and closed before bulk earthwork operations commence
Detail - Granular fill material to fill any voids in the batter slope shall be crushed AP65 material
Frequency - Prior to receiving rock rip rap
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Supplier material test certificate

Conformance Criteria - AP65 shall be a hard, durable, well graded, free draining material with a maximum particle size of 100mm and 65mm respectively and not more than 5% by mass passing a 75- micron sieve. The fill material shall be free of organic fines and vegetative matter.
Detail - Subgrade Cut and Fill Construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure clearing and topsoil stripping does not extend past survey & clear the site with organic material / unsuitable soils
Records - CS-4100 Subgrade Approval Check Sheet
Detail - Filling carried out in fully drained conditions with no free water on the working surfaces. Any erosion to be repaired immediately
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Any voids larger than 300mm to be filled with 100 to 300mm diameter chinker rock
Detail - Granular Fill (AP65) used in voids for batter slopes shall be placed in layers not exceeding 200mm loose thickness and be compacted
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - The material shall be compacted by using hand-held mechanical tampers achieving 95% of the maximum dry density as determined by NZS 4402 1986 Test 4.1.1.
Detail - Ensure cut/fill slopes comply with design prior to next process taking place
Frequency - Prior to placing topsoil/pavement/ finished surfaces
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey / Drawings
Conformance Criteria - As-built Survey & Drawing Mark-Ups to be reviewed and accepted by CPS Engineer
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
10 - Completion Sign Off From Fields Below
